publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2568 Mr Mike Rumbles: International Year of Mountains-That the Parliament notes that 2002 is the International Year of Mountains; supports the event's aim of raising public awareness of the high ecological value and wider socio-economic significance of mountains; recognises the global importance of Scotland's mountainous areas, particularly their role in shaping the nation's image and culture, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to support the year's celebrations by fostering debate between local communities, farming interests, rural businesses, public bodies, and non-governmental organisations on how to maximise the mutual benefit from activities aimed at safeguarding, enhancing and promoting enjoyment of Scotland's mountain heritage.
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-2568 Mr Mike Rumbles: International Year of Mountains-That the Parliament notes that 2002 is the International Year of Mountains; supports the event's aim of raising public awareness of the high ecological value and wider socio-economic significance of mountains; recognises the global importance of Scotland's mountainous areas, particularly their role in shaping the nation's image and culture, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to support the year's celebrations by fostering debate between local communities, farming interests, rural businesses, public bodies, and non-governmental organisations on how to maximise the mutual benefit from activities aimed at safeguarding, enhancing and promoting enjoyment of Scotland's mountain heritage. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mr Murray Tosh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) John Scott*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Scott Barrie*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Robin Harper*, John Farquhar Munro*
S1M-2568 International Year of Mountains (lodged on 19 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
